edu.stanford.cs.pptx

Class PPTextShape

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPShape
      • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPTextShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PPAutoShape

    public class PPTextShape
extends PPShape
    This abstract class represents the class of shapes that contain text within an outline.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      PPTextShape()

    • Constructor Detail

      • PPTextShape

        public PPTextShape()

    • Method Detail

      • setText

        public void setText(String text)
        Sets the text of the shape. If no bounds have been explicitly set, this method also sets the bounding box of the text according to the contents. Note that the origin of the bounding box is the upper left corner and not the baseline.
        Parameters:
        text - The new contents for the text shape

      • getText

        public String getText()
        Returns the text of this shape.
        Returns:
        The text inside this shape

      • setFont

        public void setFont(Font font)
        Sets the font for the entire text.
        Parameters:
        font - The new font for the text

      • setFont

        public void setFont(String str)
        Sets the font for the entire text. In this version of setFont, the font is expressed as a string in the form 
            "family-style-size"
        Parameters:
        str - A string representing the font

      • getFont

        public Font getFont()
        Returns the text font.
        Returns:
        The font for the text

      • getFontMetrics

        public FontMetrics getFontMetrics()
        Returns the metrics for the text font. Unfortunately, these metrics are not compatible across platforms.
        Returns:
        The font metrics for the TextBox

      • setFontColor

        public void setFontColor(Color color)
        Sets the font color.
        Parameters:
        color - The new font color

      • setFontColor

        public void setFontColor(String str)
        Sets the font color to the color indicated by str, which is either a standard color name or a string in the form "#rrggbb".
        Parameters:
        str - The new color expressed as a string

      • getFontColor

        public Color getFontColor()
        Returns the font color.
        Returns:
        The font color for the text

      • setHorizontalAlignment

        public void setHorizontalAlignment(String alignment)
        Sets the horizontal alignment for the text in this shape. The alignment must be one of the following strings: "Left", "Center", "Right", or "Justify".
        Parameters:
        alignment - A string specifying the horizontal alignment

      • getHorizontalAlignment

        public String getHorizontalAlignment()
        Returns the horizontal alignment for the text in this shape. The alignment will always be one of the following strings: "Left", "Center", "Right", or "Justify".
        Returns:
        A string specifying the horizontal alignment

      • setVerticalAlignment

        public void setVerticalAlignment(String alignment)
        Sets the vertical alignment for the text in this shape. The alignment must be one of the following strings: "Top", "Middle", or "Bottom".
        Parameters:
        alignment - A string specifying the horizontal alignment

      • getVerticalAlignment

        public String getVerticalAlignment()
        Returns the vertical alignment for the text in this shape. The alignment will always be one of the following strings: "Top", "Middle", or "Bottom".
        Returns:
        A string specifying the vertical alignment

      • setLineSpacing

        public void setLineSpacing(double spacing)
        Sets the line spacing for the text in this shape. The line spacing is proportional to the font size so that 1.0 represents normal spacing, 2.0 is double spacing, and so on.
        Parameters:
        spacing - The line spacing

      • getLineSpacing

        public double getLineSpacing()
        Returns the current line spacing.
        Returns:
        The current line spacing

      • setWordWrapFlag

        public void setWordWrapFlag(boolean flag)
        Sets the word wrap flag that indicates whether text in the box wraps around at the end of each line.
        Parameters:
        flag - The new setting of the word wrap flag

      • getWordWrapFlag

        public boolean getWordWrapFlag()
        Returns the current setting of the word wrap flag.
        Returns:
        The current setting of the word wrap flag

      • setLeftMargin

        public void setLeftMargin(double margin)
        Sets the left margin for the text.
        Parameters:
        margin - The new left margin

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds(Rectangle2D bounds)
        Sets the initial bounding rectangle for this shape on the slide.
        Overrides:
        setBounds in class PPShape
        Parameters:
        bounds - A Rectangle2D value specifying the initial bounds

      • setScale

        public void setScale(double sf)
        Scales the shape uniformly by sf in each dimension. Note that this method changes the initial scale factor of the shape and does not offer a mechanism to scale a shape dynamically.
        Parameters:
        sf - The scale factor

      • setScale

        public void setScale(double sx,
                     double sy)
        Scales the shape independently along the two coordinate axes. Note that this method changes the initial scale factor of the shape and does not offer a mechanism to scale a shape dynamically.
        Parameters:
        sx - The scale factor in the x direction
        sy - The scale factor in the y direction

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(double theta)
        Rotates the shape counterclockwise by theta degrees. Note that this method changes the initial orientation of the shape and does not offer a mechanism to rotate a shape dynamically.
        Parameters:
        theta - The number of degrees by which the shape is rotated

      • getRotation

        public double getRotation()
        Returns the rotation angle of the shape.
        Returns:
        The rotation angle of the shape

      • setColor

        public void setColor(Color color)
        Sets both the line and fill color of the shape to the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - The new color for both the outline and the interior

      • setColor

        public void setColor(String str)
        Sets both the line and fill color of the shape to the specified color, which is either a standard color name or a string in the form "#rrggbb".
        Parameters:
        str - The new color expressed as a string

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(Color color)
        Sets the fill color of the shape.
        Parameters:
        color - The new fill color

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(String str)
        Sets the fill color of the shape to the specified color, which is either a standard color name or a string in the form "#rrggbb". The string "none" can be used to specify an unfilled shape.
        Parameters:
        str - The new color expressed as a string

      • getFillColor

        public Color getFillColor()
        Gets the fill color of the shape.
        Returns:
        The fill color of the shape

      • setLineColor

        Sets the line color of the shape.
        Parameters:
        color - The new line color

        Sets the line color of the shape to the specified color, which is either a standard color name or a string in the form "#rrggbb".
        Parameters:
        str - The new color expressed as a string

      • getLineColor

        public Color getLineColor()
        Gets the line color of the shape.
        Returns:
        The line color of the shape

      • setLineWeight

        public void setLineWeight(double weight)
        Sets the line weight for the shape.
        Parameters:
        weight - The new line weight in points

      • getLineWeight

        public double getLineWeight()
        Gets the line weight for the shape.
        Returns:
        The line weight in points

      • setStartArrow

        public void setStartArrow(String str)
        Sets the arrow mode for the start of the line. The arrow mode is a hyphen-separated string consisting of the type (triangle, stealth, diamond, oval, circle, or arrow), a size indicator for the width of the arrowhead (large, medium, or small), and a similar size indicator for the length of the arrowhead.
        Parameters:
        str - A string indicating the arrowhead style and shape

      • getStartArrow

        public String getStartArrow()
        Gets the arrow mode for the start of the line.
        Returns:
        A string indicating the arrowhead style and shape

      • setEndArrow

        public void setEndArrow(String str)
        Sets the arrow mode for the end of the line. The arrow mode is a hyphen-separated string consisting of the type (triangle, stealth, diamond, oval, circle, or arrow), a size indicator for the width of the arrowhead (large, medium, or small), and a similar size indicator for the length of the arrowhead.
        Parameters:
        str - A string indicating the arrowhead style and shape

      • getEndArrow

        public String getEndArrow()
        Gets the arrow mode for the end of the line.
        Returns:
        A string indicating the arrowhead style and shape
